content: Implemented single-line streaming INFO logger to address user feedback about verbose startup output. The new StreamingHandler shows progress indicators that update in place using carriage returns while keeping ERROR and WARNING messages on separate lines for visibility.

metadata.user_request: Stream INFO logging lines in a single line for cleaner startup output
metadata.implementation_approach: Custom StreamingHandler with carriage return streaming
key_features: Single-line INFO message streaming with carriage returns
Preserved ERROR/WARNING visibility on separate lines

user_feedback_addressed: Verbose startup logging creating cluttered console output
solution_benefits: Cleaner startup experience with reduced visual clutter
Progress indicator capability for long operations
